title: New Website new me?
content: Well this is awkward a few weeks ago I had this whole setup done with Gatsby and React, and I was super proud if it. And before that I was confident to make an app that was created with BabylonJS. Well that didn't work out as it was too big and took too long to load. Now I am writing my third iteration of my personal website. That is being done and created with PixiJS a 2D library for the web. So what you see here is indeed all powered by WebGL and there is no HTML, well almost no HTML or CSS involved!
